data: Leaning from his saddle, Joe Marshall looked into the cup that hung on the turpentine-tree.
Pollock, Frank Lillie, 1876-1957; Edwards, H. C. (Harry C.), 1868-1922 [Illustrator]; Jackson, John Edwin, 1876-1950 [Illustrator]
